entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
